title: You Can't Hide Your Lying Zeits 9/2: Edit Button, Pedo Hitler, $3 Movie Tickets, Third Pole, Truth Social, The Crown
itunes:title: You Can't Hide Your Lying Zeits 9/2: Edit Button, Pedo Hitler, $3 Movie Tickets, Third Pole, Truth Social, The Crown
description:
In this edition of You Can't Hide Your Lying Zeits, Jack and Miles discuss the edit button coming to Twitter, Joe Biden=Pedo Hitler?, $3 movie tickets for National Cinema Day, the "Third Pole" in Pakistan, Google Play vs. Truth Social, and the upcoming season of 'The Crown'!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
